title: DJ SONA RELEASE (RIOTER INFO)
body:
> [{quoted}](name=Riot Galetta,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=a7ExrdB9,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-05T00:57:31.153+0000)
>
> Hey just to clarify DJ Sona will not be out in patch 5.3. She's going to be on PBE for an extended period of time in order for her to get the proper amount of quality testing! She's very very complicated.  @u@

This is from a board about questions frequently asked about DJ Sona. Honestly, I'm a little dissapointed that it won't be in patch 5.3. I was really looking forward to it, but anyways, what do you guys think?

replies.body: I still can't understand...why they're posting all of this information if they aren't ready to release her. The least they could do is announce that she will be coming soon...within the next 2-4 weeks. Instead they have images of her circulating around...as if they're going to release it within a reasonable time. Maybe they made a mistake...or maybe this is their marketing strategy. Either way, it is having the opposite effect on me right now. IF it was a mistake...they should own up to it and take all of the marketing down until it's time for the sale to begin. If this is part of their marketing strategy...I'm to the point where I don't even want it anymore. Why tease? I'm already irritated with league.

Hey there! 

Having Sona not release in Patch 5.3 wasn't a mistake. :] 

As Riot Galetta stated, DJ Sona is a pretty complicated skin. She's got a lot of music, particles, form swapping and moving parts. 

We wanted to release her to PBE a bit earlier than most skins because having more people playing her means a better chance at catching any glaring bugs before release. (We've also got a team testing her, but the more eyes the better!)

Our goal is to have DJ Sona in the best shape as possible when she hits live, rather than rushing her out the door with a bunch of unpleasant bugs to play with. :]

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=P5EkcaYk,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2015-02-05T18:46:41.673+0000)

I understand, and I know you guys are doing your jobs and I love that you work so hard for us, I just wish we got an actual estimate as to when it will be released. 
I want to be able to know how much I'm going to have to spend, since I have a lot going on right now and I do definitely plan on buying this skin, I want to plan accordingly. 

Thank you for commenting though, I appreciate that you guys are trying to clear it up, but i think it confuses people that we never even get a ROUGH estimate.
So we should expect a month? Just as a timeline perspective.

How long am I going to have to wait? I understand it's complicated...you seem very upbeat. I'm obviously not trying to insult the quality of the skin, but rather the marketing. I love this skin so much...I want it so very badly...but there's nothing I can do...I was so excited to see it on the client...expecting it to come soon...I earned and saved around 30 dollars specifically for this skin. Sona is one of my favorite Champions...I feel very tormented right now.  Why not release it unfinished? I will gladly give you my money. I am in financial trouble currently...and I hate to admit this but League makes me happy. Playing with friends, people...etc. I may not even be able to afford DJ Sona when she is released...Maybe I won't even have internet. To me, prepurchasing DJ Sona would be worth it. I really hope Riot is trolling me right now. I Really hope.

> [{quoted}](name=hairytickle,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=P5EkcaYk,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-02-05T18:07:09.216+0000)

I agree, I hate when they decide to hype it up like this, they even made an official webpage, it's like when SR didn't come out for like 5 months. It sucks that they get you happy and going and then say, "You may have to wait a lot longer than 2 weeks." which is the usual PBE wait time.

Yeah, it's like holding a cheesecake in front of a bunch of hungry people. 
Then saying I'll give it to you next year. 
By then no one will remember or want to eat it.

I knew she wasn't coming in the next patch, was pretty obvious.  They do that often with bigger projects like this.  She's pretty much like a champion rework at this point and needs lots of testing before she goes live. They've already worked out the main problems they found in their private testing, so now the PBE testing is here to find anything else so that she's all good for the big release.
i hyped myself up way too much and now its just like RITO WHY, WHY

I did that too. I hyped myself up, dove into all the information, listened to the new music tracks for hours on end...

I bought RP the day I heard about her thinking I'd save it a few weeks for when she came out of PBE. Now I'm considering spending what I bought and re-buying when she's actually out, but if she comes out sooner than April, I don't wanna have spent it and not had the money when she's out, in the case she's on sale for only a day or so. :/

Sucks, really.

Its crazy that people are trying to think she would be out soon, valentines and lunar revel are within the next 2 weeks 14 feb and new years in the Chinese calendar is on the 19th, so we have jinx and the warring kingdoms nid and kat coming, to top it off sweetheart annie and heartseeker varus are due with the annie skin already penciled in for 5.3.

Lets look even further, there are 4 other skins, the Inquisitor (warden) and marauder skins that have been on the pbe for a couple of weeks now that will probably be released before dj sona.  The sona skin has JUST been released for testing on the pbe and most skins get at least a month on the pbe for testing before going live, then think that dj sona is an ultimate skin so there will probably have to be a lot of testing and texture rebalancing and little things here and there worked out.

TBH i am not expecting to see her till mid March or early April and am not getting my hopes up that she will be released before then, now if she comes out before then i will be happy as i am looking forward to it.

I guess people just want the new content but would then get upset if they released her and loads of bugs were found and she had to be disabled for a time to fix it, then what an uproar you would have.

All good things to those who wait guys.
I think its more of a situation where hype only lasts so long, like with Heroes of the Storm. A lot of people I know who haven't gotten into the Beta just don't care anymore.
i wasn't expecting her to be out any time soon for skins so not very surprised. maybe in like minmum of 2 patches that we'll get her, and even there i'm being quite optimistic.
just wait 4 weeks instead of 2? got majoras mask to keep occupied in the meantime.
